name: What will it take?
description:
"What Will It Take?" is a 3D side scrolling platformer, this is my first ever game so it was interesting learning new stuff. It is really short but there is a start and a finish. I really wanted to add more stuff to the end and more abilities to the shop but I ran out of time. This is more of an idea then a proper game.

All visual effects are from "Polygon Arsenal" and audio from SidearmStudios. Everything else was made by me.

KNOWN BUGS:

Don't pause while fading into level.

Wall jump disables jump sound.
